faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About PHANTOM RADAR
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email.

items.title: What is PHANTOM RADAR?
items.description: PHANTOM RADAR is a data analysis platform built for YouTube content creators. It helps you quickly discover potential creators, manage benchmark accounts, monitor video data, and analyze popular tags, letting data drive your content strategy.

items.title: Do I need technical knowledge to use it?
items.description: No! PHANTOM RADAR is designed to be very simple and easy to use. We provide detailed tutorials to help you get started quickly, even newbie creators can use it easily.

items.title: How to get YouTube API?
items.description: We provide detailed API configuration tutorials, it only takes 5 minutes to complete the setup. YouTube API is completely free with a certain daily free quota. If you need more quota, you can use our API pool management feature.

items.title: Is the data secure?
items.description: Very secure! All data is stored in your local browser, we do not collect or store any of your data. You can export and backup your data at any time.

items.title: Are there usage tutorials?
items.description: Yes! We provide detailed documentation and video tutorials to help you quickly master each feature. If you encounter problems, you can also contact us by email for help.

items.title: Which platforms are supported?
items.description: Currently mainly supports YouTube platform data analysis. We plan to support more video platforms in the future, please follow our updates.
